channel.title: Full ghostly... help!
channel.description: I wish to make one my server on thing. Reasuming, when player wear full ghostly, he can attack all players. No matter in what place.

item.title: Full ghostly... help!
item.dc:creator: @oron oron
item.description:
@oron wrote:

Search for:

public boolean nonWild() {

Then in the if statement below it you would put something like:

playerEquipment[playerHands] == (itemID)

Replace the itemID with the itemID for ghostly hands or whatever. Then change playerHands to whatever is necessary like hood (not sure the exact word) along with the matching itemID.

I ainâ€™t spoonfeeding you anymore than that

Read full topic
